alert.note: Alert for Cerro Gordo; Emmet; Hancock; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Winnebago; Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Emmet, Worth, Kossuth, Hancock, Cerro Gordo, Winnebago and northern Palo Alto Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 314 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lost Island Lake to 6 miles northeast of Rockwell. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Additional heavy rainfall of up to three more inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rockwell around 320 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Mason City, Nora Springs, High Lake and Estherville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 181 and 218. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cerro Gordo; Emmet; Hancock; Kossuth; Palo Alto; Winnebago; Worth
